translation.en: Calling all trains!
♪ All aboard, let's make tracks ♪
translation.it: Tutti a bordo! A tutto gas!

translation.en: ♪ Mighty Express ♪
♪ Mighty strong and mighty fast ♪
♪ Mighty, Mighty Express ♪
♪ Put our crew to the test ♪ ♪ Mighty Express ♪
translation.it: Metti alla prova la squadra Mighty Express!

translation.en: ♪ It's mighty time ♪
♪ All aboard, we're on our way ♪
♪ Mighty fast to save the day ♪ ♪ Mega mission to the max ♪
translation.it: E l'aiuto riceverai Mega Missione passo e chiudo

translation.en: ♪ Let's make tracks ♪
[Flicker] Pirate Trains Ahoy!
Arr, mateys! In honour of our first beach day this spring,
translation.it: Ciurma, in onore del primo giorno di mare,

translation.en: I'll tell ye the story of the most famous train pirate to sail the seven seas… Trackbeard!
translation.it: vi parlerò del treno pirata più famoso ad aver solcato i sette mari. Barbatreno!

translation.en: [gasping] Nice!
Trackbeard is my most favourite pirate ever!
translation.it: Barbatreno è il mio pirata preferito!

translation.en: I made my hat just like his!
translation.it: Ho un cappello come il suo.

translation.en: I wanted to grow a beard like his too, but it would take way too long.
translation.it: Volevo farmi crescere la barba, ma ci avrei messo troppo tempo.

translation.en: Legend says that Trackbeard sailed to this very beach in search of buried treasure.
translation.it: Pare che Barbatreno sia arrivato qui in cerca di un tesoro sepolto.

translation.en: When he found it, he hid his loot in a secret cave lair,
translation.it: Che ha poi nascosto in una caverna segreta,

translation.en: somewhere right here in town!
translation.it: da qualche parte qui in città.

translation.en: A secret pirate cave lair filled with secret pirate cave lair treasure?!
translation.it: Una caverna pirata segreta con un tesoro pirata segreto?

translation.en: So cool!
Some say that on foggy nights, you can still see the ship sailing near Beach Station!
translation.it: Nelle notti di nebbia, si vede la nave alla Stazione della Spiaggia.

translation.en: Dude! What's up with Tiny? What could possibly be so exciting?
translation.it: Cos'ha Tiny? Cosa può esserci di così interessante?

translation.en: Uh, guys? -Look! -Whoa!
Amazing!
Tiny! Is that a real pirate ship?
It looks super piratey to me!
And super huge!
It can't stay here at the beach.
I'll call Max. He'll know what to do!
It looks just like the one from the book!
It's Trackbeard's ship?!
translation.it: È davvero la nave di Barbatreno?

translation.en: Calling all trains!
Please report to the busy board for today's Mega Mission.
translation.it: Alla Bacheca delle attività per una Mega Missione!

translation.en: C'mon, Dread Pirate Diesel!
It be mighty time! -Arr! -[train whistle blowing]
Today's Mega Mission goes to…
translation.it: La Mega Missione di oggi va a…

translation.en: [Max] Freight Nate!
Freight Nate is never late!
[Max] You get to pick up a pirate ship from Beach Station
translation.it: Porterai una nave pirata dalla Stazione della Spiaggia

translation.en: and deliver it to Museum Station
translation.it: Porterai una nave pirata dalla Stazione della Spiaggia alla Stazione del Museo, dove la vedranno tutti.

translation.en: so everyone can see it!
translation.it: alla Stazione del Museo, dove la vedranno tutti.

translation.en: A pirate ship?! I can make that delivery fast, fast, fast-arr!
translation.it: Una nave pirata? Sarò veloce velocissimo.

translation.en: Please, please, please can Diesel and I come with you?
translation.it: Ti prego, io e Diesel possiamo venire?

translation.en: We love pirates! We even look like pirates!
translation.it: Adoriamo i pirati. Ci assomigliamo anche.

translation.en: Sure! Ye shall be me trusty crew!
translation.it: Certo. Sarete il mio fidato equipaggio.

translation.en: Alright, Pirate Express! It's time to…
translation.it: D'accordo, Pirate Express, è l'ora del…

translation.en: -Clean up! -Tune up!
-Hook up! -To the beat of my sweet track!
translation.it: Ancoraggio! Al ritmo della mia musica!

translation.en: ♪ It's time to clean up ♪
♪ It's time to tune up ♪
♪ It's time to hook up ♪
It's wash time! Break it down!
♪ Scrub-a-dub-dub ♪ ♪ Scrub, scrub-a-dub-dub ♪
♪ Scrub-a-dub-dub-dub ♪
♪ Scrub-a-dub-dub ♪
♪ Scrub, scrub-a-dub-dub ♪
♪ Scrub-a-dub-dub-dub ♪
♪ It's time to clean up ♪ ♪ It's time to tune up ♪
translation.it: È l'ora del lavaggio È l'ora del fissaggio

translation.en: ♪ Mighty Express ♪
Check.
Check. Checkity check-check.
And… You are Liza-certified!
translation.it: E adesso sei certificato da Liza.

translation.en: [Max] And now it's time to hook up, with your Super Extendo Car!
translation.it: È il momento di ancorare il carro merci estensibile.

translation.en: The only car big enough to carry a mighty pirate ship!
translation.it: L'unico che può portare una nave pirata.

translation.en: And I'll ride along too! There's no way I'd miss this pirate adventure!
translation.it: Verrò anch'io. Non posso perdermi un'avventura pirata.

translation.en: Pirates, ho!
Now you're ready to…
-Make tracks! -Make tracks!
Chugga, chugga, zoom!
[Nate] Come on, mateys!
Aye aye, Captain!
Keep an eye out for any scallywags, crew!
Don't worry, I brought my trusty water balloon car!
In case of any high-seas pirate battles!
translation.it: in caso di battaglie tra pirati.

translation.en: Yes, battles! Wait, battles?
Great thinking, Captain Flicker! About these battles…
[Nate] Approaching Beach Station.
[Flicker] Isn't it the coolest?!
According to my calculations, that really is Trackbeard's ship!
translation.it: Secondo i miei calcoli, è la nave di Barbatreno.

translation.en: Time to load this ship onto the Super Extendo Car!
translation.it: È il momento di caricarla sul carro estensibile.

translation.en: -Thanks, Tiny! -[whale calling]
Phew! Pirate ship aboard and ready to go!
translation.it: Nave pirata a bordo pronta a partire!

translation.en: Best day ever!
♪ A pirate crew are we ♪
♪ Sailing the seven seas ♪
♪ To ports unknown, The ocean, our home ♪
♪ It's pirate treasure we seek, arr! ♪ Whoops!
[Nate] Is that a treasure map?
translation.it: Quella è una mappa del tesoro?

translation.en: I'll get it! Mega Grabber Claw, activate!
translation.it: Ci penso io. Super Pinza, attivata!

translation.en: Yes! I got the map!
Yeah!
-[gasping] -But… We lost the ship.
We gotta get that ship back!
♪ A pirate crew are we ♪ ♪ Chasing our ship we need ♪
translation.it: Una ciurma pirata siam La nostra nave inseguiam

translation.en: ♪ Where it goes, nobody knows ♪ ♪ But we'll definitely need More speed, arr! ♪
translation.it: Dove va, nessuno lo sa Ma servirà più velocità

translation.en: [Faye] Time to get back in your pen, piggies!
♪ A pirate crew are we ♪ ♪ Chasing our ship we need ♪
translation.it: Una ciurma pirata siam La nostra nave inseguiam

translation.en: Huh? Now where'd those little oinkers go?
The Popstar Piggies pillaged our pirate ship!
translation.it: I Maialini Superstar hanno predato la nave.

translation.en: [gasping] I'll fetch 'em!
The pirate piggie ship is about to run out of tracks up ahead!
translation.it: La nave dei maialini pirata ha finito i binari!

translation.en: I'll just make a switch! No problemo.
Big problemo!
The track switch is stuck!
Captain Flick-Arr will save it!
I can't believe it! I did it!
translation.it: Non ci credo. Ce l'ho fatta!

translation.en: I mean, of course I did it.
[Nate] Approaching Museum Station!
We're supposed to deliver the ship to the museum, not crash into it!
translation.it: Dobbiamo consegnare la nave, non farla schiantare nel museo!

translation.en: Okay, piggies! Time to walk the plank!
Okay, I have no choice!
Mega Lasso, activate!
Phew! Gotcha!
Mega yo-ho-hose, activate!
Grab it with me, mate!
Mega Claw, activate!
Mega Stabilizer Legs, activate!
Pull! Strong, strong, stronger!
Hoo-ee! That was a close call!
But now we gotta get you piggies back to the farm.
translation.it: Ora riporto i maialini alla fattoria.

translation.en: Well, the delivery didn't go exactly as planned.
translation.it: La consegna non è andata come previsto,

translation.en: But we did get the ship to Museum Station!
translation.it: ma la nave è alla Stazione del Museo.

translation.en: And we found Trackbeard's map! It even smells like pirate!
translation.it: E abbiamo la mappa di Barbatreno. Odora di pirati.

translation.en: Hey! There's a message here!
What's it say, what's it say?!
It says… “If ye think ye be mighty brave, then take me ship back to me cave.”
translation.it: Dice: "Se tanto coraggio tu avrai, la nave nella mia caverna porterai".

translation.en: [gasping] His treasure cave!
Check it out…
The map shows how to get there! X marks the spot!
translation.it: Mostra come arrivarci. La X segna il punto.

translation.en: Let's call Max!
Hey, Nate. What's up?
The pirate ship has been delivered to Museum Station!
translation.it: La nave è alla Stazione del Museo,

translation.en: But… we found a map that leads to Trackbeard's lair!
translation.it: ma abbiamo trovato una mappa per il covo di Barbatreno!

translation.en: -Whoa, cool! -Whoa, cool!
Secret pirate cave lair, actually.
Yeah! But the cave is way out in the ocean,
translation.it: Ma la caverna è al largo.

translation.en: and the map says we have to take the pirate ship back there.
translation.it: Secondo la mappa, dobbiamo portare lì la nave.

translation.en: His lair could have a lot more pirate things to put in the museum!
translation.it: Potremmo trovare altri tesori per il museo.

translation.en: Okay, Mighty Express! New Mega Mission!
Follow the map, and sail the pirate ship back to Trackbeard's cave!
translation.it: Seguite la mappa e riportate la nave alla caverna.

translation.en: We get to sail the pirate ship?! Best day ever!
translation.it: Andremo per mare con la nave pirata? Che giornata!

translation.en: Roger that! This pirate crew is ready for more adventure!
translation.it: Ricevuto. La ciurma è pronta per altre avventure.

translation.en: Can Diesel and I ride on Trackbeard's ship? Please, please, please, please?!
translation.it: Io e Diesel possiamo salire sulla nave? Per favore!

translation.en: Okay! But be careful up there! And I'll take your water balloon car.
translation.it: - Ok, ma state attenti. - Io prendo il lancia-gavettoni.

translation.en: ♪ A pirate crew are we ♪
♪ Sailing the seven seas ♪
♪ To ports unknown, The ocean, our home ♪
♪ It's pirate treasure we seek, arr! ♪
Whoa! Is it just me, or is Gusty Gulch especially gusty today?
translation.it: Sbaglio o il Burrone Ventoso è molto ventoso oggi?

translation.en: Oh no! The map!
Wait, what?! We lost the map?!
Oh, good. Got it.
Uh, is it just me, or are we going faster than fast, fast, faster?
translation.it: Sbaglio o stiamo andando più veloci di veloce velocissimo?

translation.en: Shiver me timbers!
The ship's… [struggling grunts] Shivering… and timbering!
translation.it: La nave sembra spinta da mille balene!

translation.en: Huh. I didn't know pirate ships could fly.
translation.it: Non sapevo che le navi volassero.

translation.en: They don't!
Oh. In that case…
-Help! -[Diesel whimpering]
Hang on! Mega Grabber Claw… activate!
[Flicker] Help!
Almost… got it…
Oh no! Now we're in the water?!
translation.it: Oh, no! Ora siamo in acqua.

translation.en: What are we gonna do?! This is terrible!
translation.it: Cosa facciamo? È terribile. È un bel guaio.

translation.en: This is totally bad! This is…
translation.it: Cosa facciamo? È terribile. È un bel guaio. È… Un momento.

translation.en: Wait…
Ships are supposed to be in the water. I knew that.
translation.it: Le navi devono stare in acqua. Lo sapevo.

translation.en: -We'll just steer it! -[barking]
Problem, big problem!
translation.it: C'è un problema! E bello grosso.

translation.en: The good news: Flicker and Diesel are okay.
That's good!
The bad news: They broke the ship's steering wheel!
translation.it: Ma hanno rotto il timone della nave.

translation.en: That's bad!
Pirate in danger! Pirate in danger!
[Nico] More bad news: The ship's floating right toward super pointy rocks!
translation.it: Un altro guaio. La nave va verso quelle rocce appuntite!

translation.en: Yep. That's more bad!
[gasping] I know how to steer the ship past those rocks!
translation.it: So come farle evitare le rocce.

translation.en: [Nate] Ready, aim… balloon!
Ah! We're under attack, Diesel!
Oh! We're being saved! I knew that too.
translation.it: Ci stanno salvando! Sapevo anche questo.

translation.en: It's working, Nate! Keep tossing!
Bam! Day and pirate ship saved!
Yeah! But… [Nico] Now it's headed out to sea.
translation.it: Sì! Ma ora è diretta in mare.

translation.en: Flicker, you're out of water balloon range!
You'll need to steer the ship! [Nico] Can you fix the steering wheel?
translation.it: Governa tu la nave. Puoi aggiustare il timone?

translation.en: Oh, no! We're missing a part!
[gasping] That's it! My toy pirate sword!
-[Flicker] Got it! -[barking]
Captain Flicker is ready to steer!
Oops, sorry! Heh heh.
translation.it: Ops. Scusa. È la prima nave pirata che timono.

translation.en: It's my first time sailing a pirate ship.
translation.it: È la prima nave pirata che timono.

translation.en: And it's going pretty smoothly!
Diesel, fetch the map so we can find the pirate cave!
translation.it: Diesel, prendi la mappa per la caverna.

translation.en: Captain Flick-Arr will be on the lookout
for any scallywags lurking in these waters.
translation.it: in cerca di furfanti nascosti in queste acque.

translation.en: [gasping] There it is! Trackbeard's secret cave lair!
translation.it: Ecco la caverna segreta di Barbatreno.

translation.en: Avast, matey! There be something lurking in the water!
translation.it: Fermo, compare, forse c'è qualcosa in agguato nell'acqua.

translation.en: Be it a scallywag?
Ah! Scallywag! I mean, giant octopus!
[Nico] Excuse me, Mr. Giant Octopus.
Please put my friends down!
translation.it: La prego, metta giù i miei amici.

translation.en: Ah, well. It was worth a shot.
Ah! Put me down!
Mission Station to Flicker,
it looks like you stopped. Is everything all right?
translation.it: - Ci risulti fermo. - Va tutto bene?

translation.en: Things are very, very, very, very not all right!
[Nico] A giant octopus is holding onto us!
translation.it: Un polipo gigante non vuole mollarci!

translation.en: Whoa! We're on our way!
-[microphone feedback] -Calling all trains! We have an emergency!
[all] It's Mighty Time!
Nate! Where's Flicker?
[Flicker] Help!
We have to get out there and save them.
But how are we gonna get across the water?
translation.it: Ma come facciamo ad attraversare l'acqua?

translation.en: [Flicker] Guys! The map says…
"If tracks to me lair ye seek…" Ah! "Pull me switch…" Whoa! "…by yonder creek!"
translation.it: "Se i binari per la caverna vuoi cercar, la leva nella baia devi azionar".

translation.en: Switch by yonder creek?
There must be a hidden switch around here somewhere!
I wish we knew what the switch looks like.
I think I found the switch.
Well, my big toe found it.
Whoa! Old pirate tracks!
Chugga, chugga, woo-hoo!
Okay, Mighty Express! Let's make tracks!
translation.it: D'accordo, Mighty Express. A tutto gas!

translation.en: My big bro! And all the Mighty trains!
translation.it: Il mio fratellone! E tutti i treni Mighty.

translation.en: Attention giant octopus!
Put down our friends!
You are breaking 157 safety rules!
Ah! 158 rules!
Mighty Express, we need a Mighty Move. Super speed!
translation.it: Mighty Express, serve una mossa Mighty. Super velocità!

translation.en: Fast, fast, faster!
Well, it's a good thing pirate ships can fly!
translation.it: Meno male che le navi pirata volano.

translation.en: [Flicker] We're heading toward Trackbeard's hidden treasure!
Full speed ahead!
[Flicker] Ahoy, mateys!
There be the entrance to Trackbeard's cave!
translation.it: È l'entrata della caverna di Barbatreno.

translation.en: Let's bring this ship in, mateys!
Ah! I didn't touch anything!
Arr you seeing what I'm seeing?!
Ahoy, landlubbers!
Captain Flick-Arr and his mighty pirate crew present…
translation.it: Capitan Flicker e la sua ciurma vi presentano…

translation.en: Trackbeard's treasure!
You know what? I say we leave the ship right here.
translation.it: Sapete che vi dico? Lasciamo la nave qui.

translation.en: We can turn the whole cave into a pirate museum!
translation.it: Trasformiamo la caverna in un museo dei pirati.

translation.en: Thanks to the mighty pirate crew of Flicker, Nico, Nate, and Diesel!
translation.it: Grazie alla Mighty ciurma formata da Flicker, Nico, Nate e Diesel.

translation.en: Done and delivered!
It was arr pleasure!
♪ A… ♪ ♪ Pirate crew are we ♪
♪ We sailed the seven seas ♪
♪ To ports unknown, The ocean, our home, ♪
♪ Now it's pirate treasure we keep, arr! ♪
